entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
